text: Titanic II is set to launch in less than two years — not in movie theaters, but on the open sea. A replica of the world ’ s most famous “ unsinkable ” ship — which struck an iceberg and sank on its maiden voyage on April 15, 1912, killing 1, 503 people — is under construction, with a maiden voyage planned for 2018. Australian tycoon and politician Clive Palmer — not J. Bruce Ismay — is at the helm of the ambitious project to faithfully recreate the luxury ship, which will be about 13 feet wider to meet current regulations. More importantly, it will carry enough lifeboats for every passenger and its hull will be welded, not riveted, just in case it comes across a rogue iceberg, the Belfast Telegraph reports. “ The new Titanic
